title: pAmAlai punaindunnai
sahitya:
pAmAlai punaindunnai pOTra munainda nAn EmAndiDAmal tuNai Indennai aNai murugA


anupallavi

  sImAn unnait-tudi sheidu nAn uyyavE cintai magizha undan vindai mahimai ceppum


caraNam    shentamizh mozhiyil undanarum pugazhinai sirappittu en paNgaL parappiDum vaNNam
endanadu Atral Etra vidam perugavE cendUr murugA un sIraDi sEruvEnayyA
